data.name: Green Loan
data.description: Our Green Loan allows you to borrow for a green initiative, such as solar hot water systems, rainwater tanks, green vehicles or top energy savings white goods.

features.additionalInfo: Your Police Bank Personal Loan may contribute to our Reduced Fees Program, helping to reduce (or eliminate) fees – save on ATM and EFTPOS transactions (as well as qualify for fee rebates), personal cheques and external electronic periodical payments.

eligibility.additionalInfo:
Green Rated Vehicles with a Combined Tailpipe CO2 rating below 150g/km details found www.greenvehicleguide.gov.au
All Solar /photovoltaic (PV) panels  are eligible
All Battery systems to store solar energy are eligible
All Solar hot water systems are eligible
All solar pool heaters are eligible
All solar hydronic heat pump system are eligible
All rainwater tanks and water pumps are eligible
All grey water treatment system are eligible
Insulation levels must be above minimum level for geographical area http://yourhome.gov.au/passive-design/insulation
Certified double glazing for windows
Split systems, evaporative cooler or high star rated zoned air conditioner – minimum energy rating 4 out of 6 stars or minimum 6 out of 10 stars
Gas, solar, hydronic or reverse cycle air conditioners with a minimum 4 star rating out of 6 or minimum 6 star rating out of 10
Energy efficient white goods and appliances – Minimum 4.5 stars out of 6 or minimum 6 star rating out of 10
Water efficient white goods and appliances – minimum 4.5 star rating out of 6
Highly efficient electric heaters – minimum 5 stars out of 6

fees.name: Personal Loan Establishment fee
fees.additionalValue: Payable when your loan is funded

fees.name: Arrears Letter Fee
fees.additionalValue: Payable when we send you an arrears letter asking you to remedy an arrears under a loan contract.

fees.name: Overdrawn Account Fee
fees.additionalValue: Payable when you exceed your credit limit by $75 or more within a calendar month. Interest will also be charged on any amount overdrawn in excess of the approved credit limit at the then current annual percentage rate

fees.name: Dishonoured Cheque fee
fees.additionalValue: Payable when a cheque or other payment to your account is dishonoured.

fees.name: Additional Statement Fee
fees.additionalValue: $5 for Archive Retrieval and $1.50 per page.
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request an additional statement.

fees.name: PPSR
fees.additionalInfo:
Certain loans will require us to use the services of PPSR. If we do so, the following may be payable:
• PPSR Registration Fee
• PPSR Financier Interest Enquiry
• PPSR Variation of Interest

fees.name: Default Notice Fee
fees.additionalValue: Payable when we send you a default notice under a loan contract when an arrears remains unremedied after we have sent you an arrears letter.

fees.name: Late Payment Fee
fees.additionalValue: Charged where the whole or any part of your loan repayment remains unpaid after 14 days past the due date. Applies to all Police Bank loans and continuing credit accounts.
